page.title: 17CHURCHES OF ASHBY
page.content:
{Congregational Church_Kilwardby St. {----------------------------------} The oldest Congregation in the County,it has a history dating from 1662.The present church was built about 1800. { {Holy Trinity Church_Kilwardby St. {-------------------------------- This church was built in 1838 of stone.It is in the Early English style with a pinnacle tower containing eight bells.
{Roman Catholic Church of {Our Lady of Lourdes_Station Rd. } {------------------------------ Founded by the 15th Duke of Norfolk in memory of his wife,it is built of Weldon stone and completed in 1915.
